description: Ancient Greek σκωπτικός (skōptikós, “given to mockery, jesting”)  +‎ -al.

adjectives.description: scoptical (comparative more scoptical, superlative most scoptical)

examples: And therefore the Roman orator, discoursing of scoptical urbanity, or jesting, how far it was allowable in speeches and pleadings, lays down an excellent rule […]
